content:
# I've successfully harvested 10 additional units of stone, bringing my inventory to 12 wood, 5 coal, and 10 stone.

# Now, I will insert the stone into the stone furnace to begin the smelting process, which will convert the stone into stone bricks.

insert_item(Prototype.Stone, furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 units of stone into the furnace
print(f"Furnace is now processing: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after inserting stone. 
print(f"Furnace status: {furnace.status}")  # Check the status of the furnace.
